Score¶

class src.score.Score(iterator)[source]¶
class Score¶

This class groups informations about a score.

iterator¶

An iterator of the generated scores.

Type:iterator
write_score(res_path, nb_pdb, alignment_dict)[source]¶

Creates a scores.csv file containing for each line a template’s name and its different scores. Creates the pdb files of the n best sum scores.

Parameters:
  • res_path (str) – The path of the directory where to stock the created files.
  • nb_pdb (int) – Number of pdb to create using the n first templates.
  • alignment_dict (dictionary) – A dictionary containing Alignment objects.
src.score.normalize_score(score_type)[source]¶

Normalization of a score using the min-max scaling method (values between 0 and 1).

Parameters:score_type (Pandas Series) – A score
Returns:The score normalized
Return type:Pandas Series
